text: The 1991 BYU Cougars football team represented Brigham Young University (BYU) in the 1991 NCAA Division I-A football season.http://byucougars.com/m-football/byu-football-year-year-results ==Schedule== ==Roster== ==Rankings== ==Game summaries== ===Florida State=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | colspan=3| First meeting |} ===at UCLA=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 1–2 | 1986 | L 10–31 |} ===at Penn State=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 0–1 | 1989 | L 39–50 |} ===Iowa (Holiday Bowl)=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | colspan=3| First meeting |} ==Awards and honors== * Ty Detmer - Davey O'Brien Award, Consensus First-team All-American, 3rd in Heisman Trophy voting ==1992 NFL Draft== {|class="wikitable" width="80%" |- align="center" style="" | Player || Position || Round || Pick || NFL club |- align="center" bgcolor="" | Ty Detmer || Quarterback || 9 || 230 || Green Bay Packers |- align="center" bgcolor="" |} ==References== BYU Cougars Category:BYU Cougars football seasons Category:Western Athletic Conference football champion seasons BYU
